room_title: Escape room "Secret Society" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: This was my first escape room and, needless to say, we did not escape. But we did have a blast.We selected the toughest of the escape rooms (Secret Society with only 21% success rate) and thoroughly enjoyed it. The puzzles were creative and required both teamwork and thought. I know a number of other escape rooms have a "zombie" theme or someone else physically in the room but I loved that the only people in the room was my group of 7 people.Would definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Society" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: It was great, we had a blast! We did the Secret Society room. It was challenging and fun.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Society" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: We are experienced escape room players and were looking for some challenging rooms. We played The Castle and Secret Society rooms and had a great time! The rooms were well thought out and flowed well. The staff members were super friendly and professional. We'll definitely be back.
